    • Method Detail

      • facebookGraphInterface

        public SirqulResponse facebookGraphInterface(Long accountId,
                                    Enums.EVENTS event,
                                    Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                                    Long permissionableId,
                                    Long assetId,
                                    String appKey,
                                    Location location)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Make Facebook posts on behalf of the user.

        Target API Endpoint: /facebook/graph
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        event - the type of Sirqul event {DOWNLOADED_APP, CHALLENGE, LEVEL_COMPLETED, LEVEL_CREATED}
        permissionableType - for posting about information related to an object. Possible types: {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, GAME_LEVEL, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        permissionableId - the object id
        assetId - used to include an asset on a Facebook post
        appKey - the application key to specify which application the post came from. Maps to "gameType".
        location - the current location of the user, used to update their known location
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getFacebookToken

        public TokenResponse getFacebookToken(Long accountId,
                             Location location)
                               throws SirqulException
        Gets a user's Facebook token.

        Target API Endpoint: /facebook/getfbtoken
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        location - used to update the user's current location
        Returns:
        a TokenResponse containing the Facebook token, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • loginWithFacebook

        public SirqulResponse loginWithFacebook(String token,
                               String appKey,
                               Integer ageRestriction,
                               Boolean returnProfile,
                               List<Enums.ProfileFilters> responseFilters,
                               Location location)
                                 throws SirqulException
        Login via Facebook. Creates a new account if logging in for the first time.

        Target API Endpoint: /facebook/login
        Parameters:
        token - the token from Facebook
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        ageRestriction - checks user's birthday to see if they meet an age requirement. If the user is under age, an error message is returned.
        returnProfile - determines whether to return a ProfileResponse on success, or a PaymentTypesResponse. Default is false.
        responseFilters - if returnProfile is set to true, this determines how much of the profile should be returned, see Enums.ProfileFilters
        location - used to update the user's current location
        Returns:
        if returnProfile is true, a ProfileResponse on valid response, else if false, a PaymentTypesResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse on an invalid response with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
